title: Mystic Adventure
description: 30 seamlessly looping moody electronic songs intended for a story driven or atmospheric game - though could be used for anything emotionally strong.
longDescription:
30 seamlessly looping moody electronic songs intended for a story driven or atmospheric game - though could be used for anything emotionally strong.


Demo: https://youtu.be/KY2RzVCp-p4


All songs come as full mixdown and also as seperated component loops (Beat, Bassline, Melody etc.), meaning you could trigger the arrangements of the songs yourself at certain points in your game (Example: Beat from song x comes in when player enters zone x) or just use single elements.
